data.title: University of Washington Athletics
data.meta_description:
SilentRain Espinoza (21) Infield  - 


	
		
			
			
			
			
			
			
			 CAREER SUMMARY
		
		
			
			NIL Opportunities: SilentRain Espinoza
			
			2023
data.text:
NIL Opportunities: SilentRain Espinoza

2023 (Fifth Year)

Third Team All-Pac-12

NFCA All-America Scholar-Athlete

Appeared in 52 games making 49 starts all at third base…11 doubles, a triple and two home runs on the season with a .309 average…4-for-4 in stolen bases…Five multi-RBI games…11 multi-hit games…three sac flies…Game-winning RBI double vs. #16 Duke (Feb. 9)…3-for-4 at Houston (Feb. 17)…2-for-3 vs. Morgan State (Feb. 18)…3-for-4 vs. #19 Oregon with a RBI double and three-run homer (March 11)…Two RBI at #2 UCLA (March 17)…Two-run single vs. #18 Utah (April 22)…Single in the Huskies seven-run comeback vs. McNeese in game seven of the regional to keep the rally going (May 21)…2-for-2 with a run scored and RBI vs. Louisiana in the Super Regional (May 26)…Posted a .965 fielding percentage with 73 putouts and 65 assists.

2022 (Senior)

Hit the go-ahead two-run home run at #19 Oregon in the eighth inning (April 23)…Recorded another two-run home run vs. Seattle U (April 26)…Had RBIs vs. #4 Arizona State (May 14) and vs. Lehigh in the Regional (May 20)…Recorded 32 assists on the season.

2021 (Junior)

All-Region Second Team

Drew a walkoff walk against Dixie State (Feb. 12)... went 4-for-5 with three runs and a home run against Southern Utah (Feb. 13)... drove in multiple runs in three straight games (Feb. 12-13)... three hits against San Diego State (Feb. 26)... two-hit day at Hawai'i (March 5)... two hits and an RBI at #14 Arizona State (March 26)... two hits and a run against #4 Oregon (April 17)... went 2-for-2 against #2 UCLA (April 24)... two-hit day against Utah (May 8).

2020 (Sophomore, season shortened)

Pac-12 Academic Honor Roll

Matched career high in hits, drove in three runs in season debut (Feb. 7)... solo home run against #5 Florida State (Feb. 14)... two hits and two RBI against #17 Texas Tech (Feb. 16)... matched career high with four RBI, vs. Nebraska (Feb. 22)... single and RBI double vs. Fresno State (Feb. 29)... first career multi-homer game (March 6)... career-best four hits and career-best five RBI against Santa Clara (March 6).

2019 (Freshman)

Pac-12 All-Freshman

NFCA All-Region Third Team

Pac-12 Freshman of the Week (April 22)

Singled in her first-ever collegiate plate appearance, against UNC (Feb. 8)... had three hits and three RBI against #19 Baylor (Feb. 10)... had a single in her second career pinch-hit at-bat (Feb. 15)... had two hits against Cal Poly (Feb. 22)... hit an RBI single at Cal (April 6)... single and a run against #23 Arizona State (April 12)... two hits against ASU (April 13)... hit her first career home run and drove in a career-best four, at BYU (April 17)... scored after both of her hits at Utah (April 18)... two-run double at Utah Valley (April 22)... career-long five-game hit streak (April 17-May 3)... doubled against #4 Arizona (May 4)... three-run homer at #4 Arizona (May 5)... two hits and two runs against Stanford (May 10)... became the first Husky freshman with multiple hits in their postseason debut since Taylor Van Zee in 2015 (May 17).
